mapper.select: select tmp.instanceSum as instanceSum, tmp.instanceOnLineSum as instanceOnLineSum, tmp.instanceSum - tmp.instanceOnLineSum as instanceOffLineSum, ifnull(round(tmp.instanceOnLineSum / tmp.instanceSum, 2) * 100, '100') as instanceOnLineRate from ( select count(1) as instanceSum, ifnull(sum(mi.IS_ONLINE), 0) as instanceOnLineSum from monitor_instance mi) tmp
